link.title: Sunshine Preschool - News

span.p: Harlan Independent School District (All Schools) participate in The Community Eligibility Provision. All students eat free meals. Our school also provides Summer Feeding. Please contact Emily Clem at 606-573-8700 Ext. 6 with questions.
